Package dev.forbit.server.instances

Class ServerInstance

java.lang.Object
dev.forbit.server.instances.ServerInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface
public abstract class ServerInstance extends Object implements ServerInterface
Abstract class that all child servers should extend

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerInstance

      public ServerInstance​(Level logLevel)
      Default constructor that automatically loads properties from System.getenv()
      Parameters:
      logLevel - the minimum level for the logger to print.

    • ServerInstance

      public ServerInstance​(Level level, Map<String,​String> environmentVariables)
      Constructor that loads ServerProperties from a map of strings.
      Parameters:
      level - the minimum level for the logger to print.
      environmentVariables - map of variables, should contain TCP_PORT, UDP_PORT, QUERY_PORT, and ADDRESS

    • ServerInstance

      public ServerInstance​(Level level, int queryPort, int tcpPort, int udpPort, String address)
      Constructor that loads the server off variables

      Advised against using.

      Parameters:
      level - the log level
      queryPort - query port
      tcpPort - tcp port
      udpPort - udp port
      address - address to host all the servers on

  • Method Details

    • startPinging

      public void startPinging​(Client client)
      Starts pinging the client
      Parameters:
      client - client to ping

    • onConnect

      public abstract void onConnect​(Client client)
      Event fired after a client connects to both TCP and UDP servers.
      Specified by:
      onConnect in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - connected client

    • onDisconnect

      public abstract void onDisconnect​(Client client)
      Event fired when client has disconnected, sockets haven't been closed but are inaccessible.

      After this method, the client is removed from clients

      Specified by:
      onDisconnect in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      client - client to remove.
